py_sim.launch.simple_vector_fields module¶

simple_vector_fields.py: Provides a series of examples of vector field following for basic fields

Provides and example of using a vector field control law with the vector field overlaid onto the live plotting of the moving vehicle

py_sim.launch.simple_vector_fields.run_single_integrator_simple_vectorfield_example() → None¶

Runs an example of a go-to-goal vector field combined with an obstacle avoidance field.

py_sim.launch.simple_vector_fields.run_unicycle_simple_vectorfield_example() → None¶

Runs an example of a go-to-goal vector field combined with an obstacle avoidance field.
